definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to feel a pain like a knife being twisted in one's heart (idiom)
sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛

sentences.english: C Check operation of the windlasses and mooring winches.
sentences.chinese: 檢查錨機和絞纜機的操作狀況。

sentences.english: Try looking for extra-lean or all-white-meat ground turkey.
sentences.chinese: 你應該試着去找全瘦肉，或味道較好的絞火雞肉。

sentences.english: Yes, we have. The latest twisting machine can do.
sentences.chinese: 三心絞可以做這樣的線。

sentences.english: She wrings her hands and whines, for she wants her son at home.
sentences.chinese: 她絞着自己的手哭泣，她想讓兒子回家。

sentences.english: Thy baited hooks shall tangle me no more.
sentences.chinese: 你上餌的鉤子不再能把我纏絞。

sentences.english: We disentangled the ropes and heaved them on the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我們解開纜繩上的結，把纜繩絞上船。

sentences.english: Check operation of the windlasses and mooring winches.
sentences.chinese: 檢查錨機和絞纜機的操作狀況。

sentences.english: For a single-core structure, a multi-unit made of soft wire-cutter.
sentences.chinese: 結構爲單線芯，採用多股軟導線復絞製成。

sentences.english: Jimmy’s tale was just one of the heart-wrenching stories I listened to
sentences.chinese: 吉米的故事是我聽到的令人心痛如絞的故事之一。

sentences.english: There is strangulation of tissue and poor blood supply.
sentences.chinese: 組織有絞窄且血液供應差。

sentences.english: Fine vascular pattern, such as ox hair was twisted filaments.
sentences.chinese: 脈管紋極細，呈絞絲狀如牛毛。

sentences.english: She passed me a skein of wool.
She passed me a skein of wool.
He is wringing out the water from his swimming trunks .
sentences.chinese: 他正在把游泳褲中的水絞出來。

sentences.english: Her heart stabbed as with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 她的心有如刀絞一般被刺痛。

sentences.english: Local drug dealers settle a score in Bissau, Guinea-Bissau.
sentences.chinese: 在幾內亞比紹共和國首都比紹，當地毒販被絞。

definition: to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
